model.name: WSN Multihop Authentication
model.author: Damian Rusinek, Bogdan Ksiezopolski
model.description: The model presents different multihop node authentication protocols for wireless sensor networks. It distinguishes two class of protocols: 1. Direct Join the Sink (DJS): a node joins directly through the sink. 2. Indirect Join the Sink (IJS): a node joins the network through intermediate node in order to reach the sink.
